website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser Momentum headphones may not have enough bass to satisfy every taste, but they are in every other way the best-sounding full-size audiophile headphones we've heard in a long time.
pros: The Sennheiser Momentum headphones are an elegant full-size over-the-ear pair featuring a brushed stainless-steel headband and plush, leather-covered earpads
Sound and build quality are excellent, and the headphones come with a nice carrying case, as well as two cables, one of which has an Apple-friendly in-line remote and microphone
cons: The Momentum headphones are pricey and don't fold flat for compact storage

customer_reviews.title: Great but I'm still returning them?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones! So Why did I return them? I own Bose and Klipsch headphones (along with another 5-6 crappy ones) at the moment, and the sound quality of these is on par with the Klipsch (way better than Bose, beats, and anything else in a big box store.) Sound clarity and balance are both great. The only small issue is that they are tight, and my head isn't even that big. The reason to return these, however is not because I wasn't happy with them; but it was because I liked them so much, I'll spend an extra 300 and buy the Momentum 2 headphones which are also wireless. I wouldn't have considered spending 500 on headphones otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good portable headphones - if you can get them on sale
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Build quality, Sound isolation Con's: 'Flat' low range sound for portable devices, not actually circumaural Well built headphones, but even though I have small ears, they are NOT over the ear. Think of them as a more posh version of an on-the-ear headphone. Fairly accurate sound with some warmth in the midrange, though if you are using them for portable devices or phones you may find them to lack some needed warmth and the lower end of the spectrum depending on the type of music you listen to. Soundstage is 'Meh'. Coming from Thinksounds as my all-day work headphones, these are a pricey disappointment. Look elsewhere for value.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So I would like to put down some words about it
customer_reviews.text: I have this headphone over a months now. So I would like to put down some words about it. Somebody complained about the ear cups being smaller compare to HD 598, it is true. I said that because I have them both. It was not bother me because my ears size is smaller than normal. However, I have to say the quality and the sound of this headphones are extraordinary. The isolation of the noise is really well. The music is balance and there is no pressure on the head like the UE 6000 or Beats by dre solo HD. I hope everyone will enjoy it as much as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounding, awesomely designed headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I used to hear about people talking about 'sound stage' and 'clarity' with regards to headphones- I've always thought of those people as nuts. After getting and trying these headphones, I must admit that my eyes have been opened and I need to apologize to those people (sorry!) With these headphones, I can tell you where instruments sat in the orchestra! They're not overly bass-ey like that other "B" brand are; so the highs are crisp and clean, and the bass is strong, but not overwhelmingly so. When I first got them, I thought I got the on-ear versions, but no- these are over ear headphones, just designed to be as small as possible.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mo

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for about 3 months now & overall I'm pretty underwhelmed by their performance. These fit on my ears, not over them, and though its possible that I have freakishly large ears, I'm only 5'10" and doubt that is the case. Also, sound quality is crisp and clear, but the low end frequencies aren't what I thought they would be. Perhaps I could hear them better if the headphones actually fit over my ear. I'll keep them, but these deliver middle-of-the-road sound quality and fit, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: They're really good even though they seemed pretty small. They sound amazing and are super comfortable. I could wear them for hours and hours.. I don't think they'd be the best airplane headphones though since their noise cancellation isn't the best but its not bad
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but small and a bit tight.
customer_reviews.text: The Momentums deliver impressive sound that tends toward the warmer side. Impressive mids and well balanced bass that isn't punchy. My problem with these headphones is that they're quite small and a bit tight. The cups fit more on the ear than over it. The band is extremely light weight and the clamping pressure isn't that great, but because the cups push on the lobes of my ears they tend to hurt after a while. I believe I'll be returning these for a larger set.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stone

customer_reviews.title: these are pretty much perfect headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have normal-sized ears, and the earcups are a bit small. They hurt my ears after an hour or so of use, but not to the point where I have to take them off. Otherwise, these are pretty much perfect headphones for the price. Good build, great sound (look up any audiophile review if you don't believe me), they look good, and the adjustable angle audio jack is a nice touch. I haven't tried them yet, but I'm guessing I would give the updated version with the bigger earcups a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Mari

customer_reviews.title: Superb Sound
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I am a little bit skeptic with Sennheiser since most of their sound signature is treble heavy; therefore, I am not expecting the amount of bass that is produce by this headphone. When I tried this cans for the first time, it truly blew me away!! I was astounded by the amount of bass. They are very full, well-rounded, and not over-power at all! The sound is crystal clear along with the clarity. Truly magnificent! Also, this can looks very modest and sturdy! Good Job Sennheiser! I will recommend this can to anybody who are looking for a great headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Yap

customer_reviews.title: Good deal at half price
customer_reviews.text: This was an accidental purchase for me. I bought it for my son for his birthday, but he didn't like the fit. I made the mistake of trying it myself, and liked it enough to keep it & buy him something else. I don't like the fit, either, but my usage is sufficiently limited, and the sound seems very good for my (classical music) purposes. I would not have paid full price, but got them at half price, and doubt that I could have gotten any better for any less.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound, as expected. Not 100% on fit.
customer_reviews.text: I won't try to review the sound quality of the Momentums, as there are far more expansive, and accurate, reviews by professionals available elsewhere. I will simply say that they provide phenomenal sound, as I would expect from Sennheiser. My only complaint is in the fit around the ear (the headband is excellent). The cups are a little undersized for circumaurals, which does cause some soreness in my (average-sized) earlobes after extended listening. The plus-side of this is that it does keep their overall dimensions small for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to not use the inline volume control cable on Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly the 3 ringed tip of the inline volume control should work in any port, but 3 of us at work all have these headphones and all have 15" Late 2011 Macbook pro's. If you use the 3 ring tip the connection isn't great and the headphones sound kind of 'off', but never bad enough that you would think the connection was bad. Only realized this after plugging in through a Y adapter to split out the mic. At first I thought they were just 'meh' headphones, about on par or a little worse than my Ultrasone HFI-580's, and was considering returning. Now I just use the (included) straight cable and they sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best audio quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best audio quality for the price. These headphones are small and portable, comfortable to wear for long periods and create great sound. I am a morning radio DJ and at first I was skeptical about switching to the Momentum headphones after using Sennheiser's HD25 for years. I was not disappointed. I'd recommend these cans to anybody looking for a stylish and functional set.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound and versatility..
customer_reviews.text: No matter what genre you listen to, the sound is crystal clear. However, if you appreciate bass you may find these to be on the lacking side. I love how stylish these look,one of the best in the headphone market. These feel great for the first hour or so...until they start causing discomfort. The cuffs come small on these, I have average sized ears and the cuffs rest on my ears. Unless you have small ears these won't offer the best comfort for sessions lasting several hours. These come with a sturdy case, but it is rather large (too large to be carrying in a backpack). They are best for home use.
customer_reviews.author: henryb

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. They are comfortable to wear for long periods of time (though the ear holes may be a bit small if you have larger ears), sounds great for every type of music I have tried so far, and they look great (I have received several compliments on them in the short time I have owned them). My only complaint, and it is minor, is that you will have to spend some time adjusting them to fit your head. The good news is that the ear pieces adjust up/down and tilt left/right to adjust to just about anybody. Sound: 9/10 Look: 10/10 Feel: 10/10 Comfort: 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They don't sound quite as good as my Sennheiser reference phones but they're good all ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't sound quite as good as my Sennheiser reference phones but they're good all around. Nothing sounds spectacular but nothing at all is bad throughout the spectrum. Good bass, soft and clear highs and mids. Nothing too brassy. Very good build quality and they're light. The monstrous case is kind of annoying to carry in my laptop bag but when you can get these for 160 new, that's a a steal. Is $350 for the new version worth it? Not to me, but they'd still be great regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: The Sennheiser Momentum Headphones are the most comfortable headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The Sennheiser Momentum Headphones are the most comfortable headphones I have ever owned. I wear these headphones literally all day at work and they are extremely comfortable. I even wear them with glasses and I haven't had any troubles. Plus, the sound quality is phenomenal! I listen to a wide variety of music, and everything I listen to sounds great. The sound quality is crisp and powerful. These headphones even come in a heavy duty case to protect them. I would highly recommend these headphones to anybody who enjoys stylish, quality headphones. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bennett

customer_reviews.title: sounds great. Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros, sounds great. Cons, you need to have small ears. I gave these a try and really liked the sound, however the holes aren't big enough for my ears. I don't really have big ears, I let my friend who is like 6'3 try them and they were more like on ear headphones for him. So since my ear had to be bent a little to fit in the hole it really made them uncomfortable after a while. I guess I am going to shop for some other ones.
customer_reviews.author: das enigma

customer_reviews.title: He thought though the headphones were a great quality, style and great accessories
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my husband. He had to return them because they hurt his ears when he wore them. He thought though the headphones were a great quality, style and great accessories. He looked at purchasing the Momentum II but they were too expensive. He had noticed that in some of the reviews on Amazon that customers commented on the ear cups being too small but that situation had been resolved in the Momentum II. He was sad that he had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: isign

customer_reviews.title: - Comfort + Sound + Style
customer_reviews.text: Earpads could be just a couple centimeters larger or support alternatives a bit easier. The set comes with 2 cables already, so it would not have been terrible if they also included an android mic. On a momentum 3, I'd like to see a built in, hidden mic like on the PlayStation Elite branded headsets. The wireless Momentum 2 has one, but it is too large for the style.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cans.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these over a year ago and they're still my go-to headphones to use at work when I want to drown the sound out. They're clear and for their price I feel like I couldn't have bought a better product. They're extremely comfortable but, as many know, the ear cups are smaller which was remedied on the new Momentums. If my current pair ever go out I'd probably get a pair of the new ones for the extra ear space.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice in general, not that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones, not too comfortable to use for hours, as they fit somewhat small for my ears (normal size ears). Like the sound, consider this item instead... The 598HD are not as nice looking, but are much more comfortable and might sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Rubén Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best headphone I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best headphone I have ever purchased. They are very comfortable; I wear them almost 8 hours straight at work. While they are not noise cancelling, they do block a good amount of sound. Sound quality is also quite high, regardless of music type. The only negative of these is that they come with a microphone designed for an iPhone. It works ok with Android but you cannot use all the feature. Evidently they do sell a separate Android cable now, but it is an additional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Not really "over-ear" headphones... unless you have micro ears.
customer_reviews.text: These sound good, but the ear cups are just too small. I find that i can't listen to them for super long because they just aren't comfortable, and I don't really have big ears. This is unfortunate because they actually sound quite good. I could listen to their "sound" for a really long time, it's not fatiguing and it is energizing.
customer_reviews.author: Greenkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! They aren't officially classed as "noise cancelling" head phones but the closed back of this pair is very effective at blocking out sound. If i'm in my living room with someone watching television or having a conversation, it does not interfere on my ability to enjoy my music or watch/listen to a show on my phone or tablet. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kent1

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound, couldn't stand the fit. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is superb, but I had to return it unfortunately because they were uncomfortable on my ears; the cups were so small, they fit more like on-ear headphones, which i don't like.
customer_reviews.author: tatumvay

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Wish they came in a bigger size too
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great headphones. Lovem. Though, if there is one con, they are super small. I got a bigger head and ears, and they feel a little sore after wearing them for a while. I only use them to listen to music because of this. Regardless, i would still suggest getting them. Can't blame a product for something like that when it still performs like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It was categorized as Like New, but it was just a new product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it through Amazon Ware house deal. It was categorized as Like New, but it was just a new product. Sound is great, compared to Bose Quiet comfort 35. Bose QC 35 is also great, but Sennheiser momentum shows clearer sound than Bose QC 35. However, Sennheiser momentum is not as comfortable as Bose QC 35. I wear glasses. When I wear Sennheiser momemtun, my ear begins to hurt after an one hour or so. However, I think the headphone will break in as I wear. In general, it is a great product for the price (less than 145 dollars).
customer_reviews.author: Totoro

customer_reviews.title: He says he can not hear anything except the music and that the noise cancelling feature is amazing! The case this product comes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he LOVES them! He says he can not hear anything except the music and that the noise cancelling feature is amazing! The case this product comes in is also very well designed. The ear phones do fit over his ear just perfectly but may be nice if they were just slightly larger. Overall I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Birch

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of the Bose QC 15's but wanted a pair I could use on my commute to work that was a bit lighter and didn't have to use a battery and this pair is perfect! It does a great job of isolating sound and the music sounds great. I mostly listen to hip hop and r&b and I love these because the bass is not overpowering and it's just right where you can hear all the lyrics and all the sounds in the song. I actually think these sound better then my Boss headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: the quality of sound is very good.
customer_reviews.text: My ears are big and this does not fit around them. However, the quality of sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer in Texas

customer_reviews.title: The BEST, the BEST on the go cans
customer_reviews.text: The BEST, the BEST on the go cans. Amazing sound, amazing noise isolation (better than Bose QC 25). What more can you ask for? Cord length is perfect. Fit & comfort are perfect. Don't need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Daisey Love

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable. They look amazing and perform the same
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a pair of headphones sound so incredible. They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable. They look amazing and perform the same. A lot of people complain about the cup size but this will only be a problem for those with large ears. The next major complaint is the lack of bass. The momentums don't lack bass they just aren't bass boosted. The bass is clear and easily heard. These are very satisfying for every genre of music. I will enjoy these headphones for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best headphones I have every owned
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones I have every owned. I travel a lot for work and wanted something to use/kill the sound of flying, it was between these and Boise QC25 but with the music up these had a much better sound. Don't get me wrong Boise makes amazing headphones but these Sennheisers sound much better. I also thought they felt more comfortable. My advise find a place that sells them locally and try them out.
customer_reviews.author: achapel

customer_reviews.title: Did not like. Very tight fitting and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. Extremely painful to wear for my wife and myself, pinching our ears badly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia and Erik

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing, but beware if you have large ears.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my experience with these headphones ended rather quickly. I loved the sound they produced, how stylish they were, and how well packaged it all was, but the ear opening wasn't designed for people with larger ears. Had these on during a 6hr flight. Did a fairly good job of filtering the outside noise, all notes were head, but they became uncomfortable. I woke up a few hours into the flight to realize my ears were in pain from the headphones clamping down hard enough against my ears (larger opening would prevent this) while wearing my glasses. I took off my glasses, put the headphones back on, and still the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The sound wasn't as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The sound wasn't as good as I expected. The highs were too sharp and the lows not deep enough. They let in too much ambient sound (NYC subway). So I returned these and bought the Urbanites: much better overall. They have a warmer, yet no less detailed, sound. And they are much better at reducing ambient noise.
customer_reviews.author: Anuprof

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have come across, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: There are no words to express how awesome these headphones are. The sound quality is out of this world. They are so comfortable I can wear them for hours without any complaints. I really believe these are better then most higher priced brand name headphones out there. Give them a try, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: These are hands down my favorite headphones to use
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down my favorite headphones to use. Well balanced audio all around, sleek looking, and comfortable. They're all around a great set of headphones. The only downside I can think of is their lack of foldability, but if I'm travelling with them I typically just rest them around my neck anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jake C.

customer_reviews.title: They've been all over the world with me and have made thousands of travel miles a little bit better.
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile, more just a day-to-day user, but these headphones are well-made, light, the microphone is very sensitive, and they're long-term-comfortable when wearing during travel. They've been all over the world with me and have made thousands of travel miles a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: heather806

customer_reviews.title: good looking, be aware it's made in China, no offense cause I am Chinese LOL
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty good, bought it as a gift for friend. The packing box is huge and good-looking too, pretty fit as a gift LOL. Since I own a HD650, compared to that model, you need to know that this one was not made in Europe, but in China, though products made in China are good enough, but who doesn't want the earphone to be produced in its origin??
customer_reviews.author: Muhan Z.

customer_reviews.title: You've got to have small ears for these to fit properly
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, like all Sennheisers. However, these should NOT be advertised as Over Ear headphones. You have to have the smallest ears imaginable for these to fit properly. Really a shame, they sound great and look great. Build quality is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these headphones. The mids and highs are awesome, the lows are a little weak. I wish I would have gone for the wireless headphones, my cord keeps getting hung up on things.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Headphones!!! 5 STAR
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really great and are a bit small but it you use it for like 30 min with breaks in between they have the Sennheiser sound quality you want and need, plus they look good going out! Great for at-home and outside use! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mw

customer_reviews.title: They sound awesome but are not flawless.
customer_reviews.text: I got these and use them daily. Less than 3 months later, the first cable that comes with them started failing. I hope the second one (that doesn't include mic or play control) lasts longer. Beware if you wear glasses. They can push on your ears quite a bit and get tiring after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Denis González

customer_reviews.title: These phones are a pleasure to wear and the sound reproduction is awesome. I am hearing details in songs that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. Bought the cans based on other Amazon reviews. These phones are a pleasure to wear and the sound reproduction is awesome. I am hearing details in songs that I've previously never heard. I am completely satisfied with the whole purchase experience. Now I can listen to my Hard Rock and enjoy the way its meant to be..
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Solid compact headphone
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound great. Do not completely go over the ears as the cups are small. This is not really a drawback because they are more compact. They seem very durable. The sound improves with the use of a headphone amplifier. I look forward to the sound after burn in. Overall pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: They're alright...but try out other options and decide for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Ear pads kind of small, after about an hour my ears start hurting a little bit...an hour and a half I have to take em off because they start to get pretty painful. They Sound really good but the bass and low end does seem kind of lacking. I like the sound of the soul v8's cans and velodyne vpulse earbuds better. Guess it's just a matter of personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod L. McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, provided you get a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned countless times before, these have fantastic build quality and are relatively well balanced (they have great mids). However, the cups on these are too small for my average sized ears and I inevitably end up with very sore earlobes. They're fairly shallow as well so chances are, some part of your ears will make contact with the hard drivers. Unless you have relatively small ears (less than 60mm top to bottom), I strongly suggest you try them out for at least half-an-hour. As much as I love the sound from these, mine are being sent back because of the fit issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Momentum Headphone. The sound reproduction and presentation is superb. I don't have to crank up the volume to get a full, clear and distinct sound. I hear the full range of parts and instrumentation throughout my jazz, classical and R & B music. I have suggested them to my son who is a musician.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Troy

customer_reviews.title: Fit was not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was too uncomfortable for me with my glasses on. Sound-wise they are decent cans for the money, as in, not especially better or worse than their price point would suggest. If you're coming from cheaper cans I'm sure you will be thrilled with the sound, but they weren't beating out my HD800s or Audezes. I had to give this a two because they just don't work for my head, too tight and too uncomfortable with my glasses on, so even if they sounded amazing I would still have returned them. If you have a larger head and wear glasses, I'd recommend trying these on somewhere first and see if they feel OK.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love Em
customer_reviews.text: The light bass has me wanting more, especially when these headphones are supposedly a legitimate alternative to the overpriced Dre Beats headphones. But, that being said, the sound is very good and I don't really mind the lack of prevalent bass. If you want a bass boosting pair of headphones, go elsewhere. If you want a good quality set of headphones that aren't made of cheap plastic, have great sound, and are cheap in comparison to the Dre Beats that dominate the market, these are definitely the headphones for you. The ear pieces weren't too small for me unlike a lot of the other reviewers...maybe I have small ears. Have a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I have it for a while right now and its ...
customer_reviews.text: I have it for a while right now and its exactly what I wanted, the other day I went to EMP music museum and I saw that they are using Momentums there too, I was really impressed because you need heavy duty stuff in a museum while every kind of people are using them.
customer_reviews.author: elyar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Completely broke after only 6 months. Still under warranty though.
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: they have a nice sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these headphones for a long time before they start to hurt my ears, they have a nice sound quality. The standard cable that comes with them started becoming intermittent after only a couple of months, but it's cheap compared to the phone cable.
customer_reviews.author: jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: These things are headphones I have many at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are headphones I have many at least a couple dozen some over the ear on the year in the year and whatever they do now,and hours I also have a comparable microphones I mean headphones
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and the sound is great!. I had not heard of this brand until I saw a recommendation in Consumer Report. The price is lower than some of the current best-sellers. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: I. Herald

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, comfortable, comfortable. Thought they would be too small, but they were perfect. Tried the Sennheiser HD380, and there is NO comparison!. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: maccabbee

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. Very clean sound, fit, and build quality. My only complaint is the original cord would get some static when I first fired them up, and would do the same if the jack twisted. It seems to happen less and less. If it goes away on its own or I find out I just had a bad cord, I'll gladly change my review to 5 stars. These make my Bose QC20's sound and feel cheap otherwise. Very well done Sennheiser Update: cord static was gone by the end of the first day. I'm not sure why it happened in the first place, but it cleared up after about an hour of use. Very happy with these now.
customer_reviews.author: tc_f23

customer_reviews.title: No point having awesome headphones if I can't wear them
customer_reviews.text: Do they look and sound amazing? Yes. Yes, they do. Can I wear them for longer than 15 minutes without physical pain to my ears? No, I cannot. So really I see no point. However, this issue has been fixed with the Momentum 2.0. Those suckers are damn comfy, so you can now fully enjoy the ridiculous sound quality without stabbing pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I will keep this short and simple. These are truly amazing headphones with the purest tone I have ever heard. I have compared these headphones side by side with my friend's many Beats and other popular brands and these surpass any other headphones I've ever tried by light years. Their sound clarity, perfect balance and warm tone will surpass your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cans!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones - I typically wear them during the day at my office while I'm working. My only comment, given I wear them for 4-6 hours a day, is that the ear cups are on the smaller side (even for normal sized ears) and if you wear glasses after an extended time the headphones can feel as though they're putting pressure on the side of your head/glasses. Otherwise, wouldn't change anything about these - love the sound, the look, the weight, etc. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel comfortable on my big head
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel comfortable on my big head. I'm used to the Bose QuietComfort (over ear), but the Momentum could not reach that level of wearing comfort at all. Good sound could not make up for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser - The Best...For A Reason
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser is THE name for top of the line headphones. These are so versatile and accurate that all I can say is to try them...you'll be sold as soon as you hear your source flowing through these phones.
customer_reviews.author: TITUS

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is unbeatable. Also these headphones look sexy ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is unbeatable. Also these headphones look sexy and chic. Cup size could be a bit bigger for more comfort, but I hear they improved this in the latest version. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: levenbreechvor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, these are the headphones you're looking for..
customer_reviews.text: Bought when on sale for my dad who travels a lot. He loves them. They are quite durable and quality better than most headphones double this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sound great but too small to be comfortably worn for
customer_reviews.text: I am a very small person and these were small on me - the reviews are right, sound great but too small to be comfortably worn for long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bent wrong at factory - do not fit
customer_reviews.text: My son give these straight back to me... because they were bent Ian's did not fit on his head. Poor quality control from a top manufacturer - disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Devote

customer_reviews.title: Lep Zeppelin with Sennheiser , THUMBS UP!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far this Headphone is better that anyone that i have ever had, that means Bose and also Beats. Sennheiser provides an extasis of sound that if you close your eyes you will feel like Robert Plant is singing beside you and the guitar of Jimmy Page, and drums of Jonh Bonham and even (pretty clear) the bass from John Paul Jones. If you love music and enjoy jus as a fan like me, you find that this headphones are the best complement you may find.
customer_reviews.author: JoZ

customer_reviews.title: It really is pretty small, it'd be more fulfilling to get more ...
customer_reviews.text: It really is pretty small, it'd be more fulfilling to get more encapsulating headphones to provide a more satisfying experience. The quality of materials and sound is still incredible
customer_reviews.author: Satou T.

customer_reviews.title: It sounds excellent and it's light on the head
customer_reviews.text: It sounds excellent and it's light on the head. The ear cuffs are small. They fit me, but if you have larger ears, you might have problems. Sometimes wearing glasses with these can be a little annoying. It's perhaps not the most comfortable pair of headphones (it's by no means uncomfortable as long as your ears fit though), but the sound quality is stellar, so 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound quality - true crystal clear with no emphasis on either bass or treble. Beautifully built and great attention to details. The ear-cups are big enough for my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: best head phones i used
customer_reviews.text: im stupid when it comes down to the nidy gridy but i cna say these sound grate and they feel grate and can take a beating and feel there price like these are the best headphones i'v used in my life
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Impresive sound, excelent quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these are my first hifi headphones, I usually used the ones bundled with apple products, and therefore I'm not actually an expert. These headphones sound fantastic I listen all kinds of music and everytime they sound great. I tried other headphoens at Apple stores, such as Marshall, Beats and Harman Kardon, and the sound isn't as presice as the one on the Momentums. I bought them just reading Amazon's reviews and I'm very pleased about my choice. Some of the users complain about the size, but so far they've been ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Ignacio Fuentes Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: I have either owned or used every good headphone out there EVER... This is perfection in simple words - rarely has anyone combined style, quality, ergonomics/comfort without sacrificing audio quality. The skew towards a little more bass is perfect - does not drown out mids, but gives the right low-lift to offset ambient noise as you move about. I held off for a while thinking they were expensive, but once I got them I feel differently. The price/value equation is amazing - I now feel like I got a steal. I also hope Sennheiser never discounts these. It would be like discounting the Taj Mahal for a real estate transaction.
customer_reviews.author: 08Caps19Fan28

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones for around the house, well made has awesome sound (i'm actually listening to them right now as I write) I bought it when it was at $200 I don't think I would buy it if the price was any higher All in all I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Funkerdoo

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It's great! Sound quality is excellent! However, 2 small things: the case is giant (I know it's not meant to be a portable or foldable headphone, but still) and the ear pads are quite small. While they fit over my friend's ears just fine - it's a close fit. If he had bigger ears... it'll probably squish them.
customer_reviews.author: Binh

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a must if you are looking for quality with no compromises: beautiful with modern and sleek design, delivers rich and crisp sound and I haven't plugged it into a dedicated DAC yet. The only con is that the pads are a bit small for me and need to be well adjust on my ears every time I put them on, this problem is fixed with the Momentum 2.0 but at time of buying costed twice more and in my opinion don't worth the extra investment mostly because the 1.0 version is still great.
customer_reviews.author: Amiram Haneman

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great without the heavy thumping bass
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great without the heavy thumping bass, and it looks nothing like what kids have on these days (which to me is a plus). I do suggest you try them on first to see if they are comfortable around your ears. I plan on using these outside in cold weather to keep my ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Zing

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! The sound quality is more than what I expected. Looks the part and definitely walks the walk. The provided carrying case is so luxurious! Loved the initial overall quality I got one for my girlfriend too! Funny thing right after I put these to her ears she was stunned speechless and a few minutes later she gave me her UrBeats. nuff said. Don't be blinded by market hype. Finally a venerable professional audio company goes head to head with the overrated Beats and sets the standard.
customer_reviews.author: H.Marshall

customer_reviews.title: just not comfortable. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Small ear cups. Sound okay, just not comfortable. Returned. I have a large head. Best comfort from Bose QC25 headphones - I just hate that they mean one more thing to keep batteries for.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Vigants

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect simply because the muffs are too small for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is high and the cables/materials are also of high quality. Not perfect simply because the muffs are too small for a normal adult. It gives you headaches after awhile. Go try the HD558 or HD598 instead (also cost roughly the same).
customer_reviews.author: Jaxel Rojas Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is surprisingly good, but the ear cups are on the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds a bit warm, but fairly accurate in my opinion. Comfort is surprisingly good, but the ear cups are on the small side. Good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones, earpads might be misshapen
customer_reviews.text: Best set of headphones I have owned, and I have gone through a few nice pair. Sound really clear, and well defined. Only problem I have is that one earpad rests on my ear and makes it a bit uncomfortable after long periods of use. I feel like the earpads are not exactly the same in size.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality. Can wear for hours with little discomfort. Edit: Left side went out after almost 1 year 2 months of use. Mostly just used to listen to music at my computer or on my phone. Will change rating once it is repaired/replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: The perfect headphone!
customer_reviews.text: The one and only thing that could make this better would be better sound isolation. I commute by train.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head & Shoulders Above The Rest
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of Beats Pro that I misplaced. My primary reason for purchase were the excellent reviews and the look of these headphones. You absolutely can't go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Too many better cans for same price are out there
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Too many better cans for same price are out there.
customer_reviews.author: ILHTM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect audiofile on the go headphone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect audiofile on the go headphone...consistent across the whole sound spectrum. Ear cups are small as noted, but sound quality is outstanding. Yes, better than the ATH m50x
customer_reviews.author: Darin Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great cans
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for a month now and I am confident to write that every time I hear them, they sound really nice - good overall balance. Bass fans will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justinto237

customer_reviews.title: these are fantastic headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: these are fantastic headphones for the price. the audio quality is unreal. a very good soundstage. I've upgraded to some pure silver audio cables and further increased the quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Connor

customer_reviews.title: HURTS LIKE THE DICKENS
customer_reviews.text: My headphones came today and while they are good looking and sound nice, they about killed my ears. when I ordered them the description read around the ear, but these are barely over the ear. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: but is still very comfortable. Awesome quality construction / materials
customer_reviews.text: Not as large of an earcup as I had hoped. Rests on the very top and bottom of my ears, but is still very comfortable. Awesome quality construction / materials. And perfect sound, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have small ears.
customer_reviews.text: I have small ears and I still have to carefully adjust these to avoid contact. That said, best sounding earphones I've ever owned. They are not noise cancelling, but they sound great, are very well made and were relatively affordable when purchased refurbished, like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Tomascak

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: After 10 days of unpacking, I had a pain in my ear. Sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Inkuk Cho

customer_reviews.title: This is a very lightweight excellent quality headphone that I use for my office
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight excellent quality headphone that I use for my office. Coworkers cannot hear what I'm listening to and they don't feel like you are wearing a helmet likes the Beats do. If it's loud bass you're after go buy a drum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aural-gasmic
customer_reviews.text: Forward sounding, high and mids are incredulously clear without sounding to brash or piercing. Just the perfect level. Bass might be a bit lacking for some, but they are just perfect for me. For a fuller bass and comparable sound quality, you might want to turn to the Audio Technica's M50s. Too bad the controller only works on Apple products, would have been fantastic if the remote works a bare minimum for other platforms as well. But I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bowei Loh

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding headphones and sold at a bargain price from an excellent seller. Would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LIANNE C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Better measurements than the newer model
customer_reviews.text: Small earpads. Amazing sound. Better measurements than the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Ehab H.

customer_reviews.title: good but not amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: after a couple weeks- they look nice and are well made. they sound is very good and arent fatiguing but sound quality isn't amazing, compared to equally priced or cheaper headphones. i have a smaller head and they're still very tight. my ears don't exactly stick out but it pinches my ears. theyre not large or heavy, which is nice, comfortable in that sense. they sound best with newer master stuff, like really loud recordings. older recordings don't sound as good, the speaker signature sound doesnt really work with them. i wear headphones often and going to try them for a couple more weeks to see if they grow on me otherwise ill have to return them
customer_reviews.author: mcgumps

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Momentum Headphone - Black
product_meta.description:
MOMENTUM is a closed back, around-the-ear headphone specially designed for music lovers wanting an iconic, sophisticated appearance, luxurious wearing comfort and rich, detailed stereo sound. The headphone boasts soft breathable leather ear cushions, metal ear cups and a stainless steel ear cup slider providing maximum durability and a custom fit. Completing the package are interchangeable cables-one with an integrated smart remote with in-line microphone, and the other a standard connection cable for excellent connectivity and ease of use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 MOMENTUM 

Highlights Closed, around-the-ear headphone design reduces ambient noise Integrated smart remote with in-line microphone for ease of use Constructed with premium natural materials MOMENTUM is a closed back, around-the-ear headphone specially designed for music lovers wanting an iconic, sophisticated appearance, luxurious wearing comfort and rich, detailed stereo sound. The headphone boasts soft breathable leather ear cushions, metal ear cups and a stainless steel ear cup slider providing maximum durability and a custom fit. Completing the package are interchangeable cables-one with an integrated smart remote with in-line microphone, and the other a standard connection cable for excellent connectivity and ease of use.

Why Sennheiser? Sennheiser is the brand of choice for many high-profile recording artists and live sound engineers, delivering the ultimate audio experience to people who crave true-to-life sound. For over 65 years, Sennheiser has applied its in-depth audio research to the development of premium headphones and microphones. Every Sennheiser product endures rigorous quality control tests to ensure you receive durable, great-sounding gear that will withstand daily use in a variety of environments.

Features  * Rich and detailed stereo sound
 * Breathable leather headband for optimum perspiration and water resistance 
 * Soft and supple ear pads made from the finest leather for excellent wearing comfort
 * Hard carrying case for maximum portability 
 * Metal earcup slider for custom fit and maximum durability 
 * 2-year warranty 

Did you notice? This headphone combines great looks and outstanding comfort with rich and detailed Sennheiser sound.

Sennheiser recommends this headphone for ... ... consumers looking for a sophisticated, comfortable design that also delivers premium Sennheiser sound quality.

Technical The MOMENTUM is a premium, closed around-the-ear headphone that delivers a frequency response of 16-22,000 Hz.

Warranty The MOMENTUM is covered by a 2-year warranty.

Technical data Headphones Ear coupling Circumaural Transducer principle Dynamic, closed Frequency response 16-22,000 Hz Sound pressure level (SPL) 110 dB (1 kHz/1 Vrms THD - total harmonic distortion (1 kHz, 100 dB SPL) <0.5% Contact pressure Approx.2.8 N Loud rating 200 mW Weight 190 g Cable Length Cable 1: 1.4 m iPod®/iPhone® cable with integrated smart remote and microphone
Cable 2: 1.4 m cable for computers, phones, music players and any device with a headphone output Connector plugs Cable 1: 3.5 mm rotatable plug 
Cable 2: 3.5 mm straight plug Warranty 2-year What's in the box?  * MOMENTUM headphones
 * carrying case
 * 6.3 mm adapter plug
 * cable with smart remote
 * standard connection cable
 * manuals
feature_bullets: Closed back, over-ear design isolates ambient noise to maximize musical enjoyment..Connectivity Technology: Wired
Premium leather ear pads and headband deliver softness and breathability for extreme comfort during long listening sessions
Precision metal ear cups and stainless steel headband provide durability and enhance sonic performance
18-ohm operating impedance produces outstanding dynamics and overall output level with portable audio devices
Luxurious hard carry case, standard and "i" device cables, and 1/4-Inch stereo adapter included. Two-year warranty.
